name: urethra transitional cell carcinoma
definition: An urethra cancer that is characterized by cancer cells forming in the renal pelvis and ureter. [url:http\://cancer.emedtv.com/transitional-cell-carcinoma-%28of-the-ureter-and-renal-pelvis%29/transitional-cell-carcinoma-%28of-the-ureter-and-renal-pelvis%29.html]
